Subject: Cannot Download Client Software from Endpoint Protector Server
Description:
Referring to Ticket #00415327, I followed the instructions for installing the Offline Client patch for the EPP clients. At Step 4, there was an error message after a couple of minutes. Nevertheless, I see the EPP client packages. However, I am unable to download the client package despite clicking on the Download button. 

Can you advise how I can download the package?
Solution_Comment__c: Upgrading the EPP server and using another application to upgrade the EPP clients resolved the issue.
